Class Deck

  • public class Deck
extends Object
    Jeff Maynard CS110 Deck Class Represents a deck of playing cards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Deck firstSplit()
      Splits the deck in half and returns the first half as a Deck object.
      ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
      Returns a reference to the ArrayList which acts as the "deck" of the Deck class.
      Deck lastSplit()
      Splits the deck in half and returns the last half as a Deck object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Default constructor. Creates and shuffles a standard 52 card deck.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeck

        public ArrayList<Card> getDeck()
        Returns a reference to the ArrayList which acts as the "deck" of the Deck class.
        Returns:
        ArrayList deck The actual "deck" of cards.

      • firstSplit

        public Deck firstSplit()
        Splits the deck in half and returns the first half as a Deck object.
        Returns:
        Deck splitDeck The first half of the deck of cards.

      • lastSplit

        public Deck lastSplit()
        Splits the deck in half and returns the last half as a Deck object.
        Returns:
        Deck splitDeck The last half of the deck of cards.
